37 void uigfx_draw_desktop_wallpaper(uint8_t* buff, uigfx_image_t *wallpaper)
38 {
39  uigfx_widget_t *tmp = uigfx_current_widget;
40  uigfx_set_widget((uigfx_widget_t*)&uigfx_screen_widget);
41 
42  for(uint16_t y = 0; y < uigfx_current_widget->yres; y+=wallpaper->yres)
43  {
44  for(uint16_t x = 0; x < uigfx_current_widget->xres; x+=wallpaper->xres)
45  {
46  uigfx_draw_image(buff,wallpaper,x,y);
47  }
48  }
49 
50  uigfx_set_widget(tmp);
51 }

53 
54 
55 void uigfx_draw_window(uint8_t* buff, uigfx_window_t *win)
56 {
57  uigfx_widget_t *tmp = uigfx_current_widget;
58  uigfx_set_widget(&win->title_widget);
59  uigfx_draw_filled_rectangle(buff,0,0,win->title_widget.xres, win->title_widget.yres, UIGFX_WIN_TITLE_BG_COLOR);
60  uigfx_draw_string(buff,(uigfx_font_t*)&UIGFX_WIN_TITLE_FONT,UIGFX_WIN_TITLE_BORDER,UIGFX_WIN_TITLE_BORDER,win->title,UIGFX_WIN_TITLE_FONT_COLOR);
61  uigfx_set_widget(&win->window_widget);
62  uigfx_draw_filled_rectangle(buff,0,0,win->window_widget.xres, win->window_widget.yres, UIGFX_WIN_WIDGET_BG_COLOR);
63  uigfx_set_widget(tmp);
64  uigfx_draw_rectangle(buff,win->title_widget.xpos-1,win->title_widget.ypos-1,win->title_widget.xres+2, win->title_widget.yres+win->window_widget.yres+2, UIGFX_WIN_BORDER_COLOR);
65 }
66 
67 void uigfx_init_window(uigfx_window_t *win, char* title, int16_t xpos, int16_t ypos, uint16_t xres, uint16_t yres)
68 {
69  win->title = title;
70  win->title_widget.xpos = xpos;
71  win->title_widget.ypos = ypos;
72 
73  win->title_widget.xres = strlen(title)*UIGFX_WIN_TITLE_FONT.xsz+ 2*UIGFX_WIN_TITLE_BORDER;
74 
75  if(xres > win->title_widget.xres)
76  {
77  win->title_widget.xres = xres;
78  }
79 
80  win->title_widget.yres = UIGFX_WIN_TITLE_FONT.ysz + 2*UIGFX_WIN_TITLE_BORDER;
81 
82  win->window_widget.xpos = xpos;
83  win->window_widget.ypos = ypos+win->title_widget.yres;
84  win->window_widget.xres = win->title_widget.xres;
85  win->window_widget.yres = yres-win->title_widget.yres;
86 
87 }

90 
91 void uigfx_select_window_widget(uigfx_window_t *win)
92 {
93  uigfx_current_widget = &win->window_widget;
94 }
